comments.body: Ops, should be an affiliate because of the code he shared along with the link which shows he is promoting his affiliate link here because if he is a member of the team and wants to create an ANN he would have shared just the website link, and also from the Image shared I can see that the withdrawal is just a small amount which is not convincing enough for someone to want to use the site even though they mentioned that no deposit is required to play on the site and that is to say the offer faucet but I also believe that will be time-consuming, so players will prefer to make a deposit and play from the deposit instead of faucet balance for time sake and to avoid some requirement such as wagering requirements for withdrawal on bets won't using the faucet bonus.
